Package edu.cuny.ai.learning.prob

Class Summary
DymEqualRewardsNArmedBanditProb implements an n-armed problem with which rewards of different arms are following an identical normal distribution.
DymVaryingRewardsNArmedBanditProb implements an n-armed problem with which rewards of different arms are following different normal distribution.
NArmedBanditProb This class presents a framework of an n-armed slot machine.
StaticEqualRewardsNArmedBanditProb implements an n-armed problem whose arms return the same constant reward.
StaticVaryingRewardsNArmedBanditProb implements an n-armed problem with which arms return constant but varying reward.
